display_long_description:
"Cricket Reality VR" - An Immersive Cricket Simulation
Core Features:
Batting Mechanics:

Precise bat physics with realistic weight simulation
Full range of shots: defensive blocks, drives, cuts, pulls, sweeps
Dynamic footwork tracking for proper shot execution
Haptic feedback matching ball impact on bat
Realistic edge/nick detection and ball deflection

Bowling System:

Natural bowling action tracking using controller motion
Full control over seam position, release point, and wrist position
Variety of deliveries: pace, spin, yorkers, bouncers
Real-time ball physics affected by pitch conditions
Ability to set field positions and bowl to plans

Environment:

Dynamic weather conditions affecting ball movement
True-to-life pitch variations (dry, green, cracked)
Stadium ambient sounds and crowd reactions
Realistic ball deterioration over time
Day/night transitions with proper lighting

Training Modes:

Net practice with bowling machine
Specific shot practice drills
Bowling accuracy challenges
Fielding reaction drills
Video analysis of technique

Performance Requirements:

Runs on standalone VR headsets (Meta Quest platform)
90Hz refresh rate minimum for smooth motion
Low latency tracking for precise timing
Optimized graphics for mobile VR
Cross-platform multiplayer support
